ml_tags: In Loving Memory LAISA WAQAINAWENI LAGILEVU – VODO Your gentle guidance, your unfailing love, and your ability "Let love and faithfulness never leave you; bind them around your neck, write them on the tablet of your heart." - Proverbs 3:3 Our cherished Laisa, the guiding eldest sister, of 7th November 1981 to 3rd August 2017 Your presence warmed every family gathering A steadfast friend and wise counsel, you were always there Your legacy of love, unity, and wisdom will forever be our guiding light. Rest peacefully in the arms of eternity, till the day we are reunited in joyful celebration. Though you are no longer with us in body, your nurturing spirit, boundless love and cherished memories continue to cradle us with warmth. to make everyone feel valued have left an everlasting imprint on our hearts. with a listening ear and comforting words Your laughter was the music that filled our hearts tender mother of three, dutiful daughter, and trusted friend.
